title: Bug 18934—Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
SR:
Build F2 (20020602)
Redhat 7.2, GTK2, KDE 2.2.10 (GTK2 only)

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.

Observed Behavior:
- The scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect.
- When opening a small image, such as an icon, the scrollbars give a false impression of functionality as they do not affect the display.
